description:
An overheard conversation between Mizusawa and Hinami gives Tomozaki a different perspective on his private lessons in conquering the game of life.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Single Choice Can Change Everything
Tatta Hitotsu no Sentakushi ga Subete o Kaete Shimau Koto mo Aru
たった一つの選択肢がすべてを変えてしまうこともある
